data.title: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות למפתחים בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם

paragraphs.context: Work as part of a devops team to establish a global data center management and deployment infrastructure that is extensible to both private and public clouds and can be leveraged across multiple data centers. This includes automating server and application deployments and upgrades, patching and upgrading of servers, and tool integration with our monitoring system and public cloud provider APIs. The team owns and maintains the tool stack, which includes OpenSource and commercial tools, as well as tools developed in-house.
